main event: A witness observed a bright object with an orange-white light in Evanston, Illinois on December 7, 1965, for about three minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright white color with an orange tail,It moved nearly horizontally across the sky, appearing to be an aircraft, but the sky was hazy, making it difficult to ascertain details.,The witness noted seeing the object close to an aircraft landing light before it disappeared behind trees.,The observation concluded that the object was likely an aircraft due to the hazy conditions, ruling out the possibility of it being a satellite.,The witness experienced vision difficulties at night and expressed uncertainty about the precise nature of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright object with an orange-white light
witness description: The witness is a male, aged 41, with astigmatism and vision difficulties at night.
